maintainer.name: Don Seiler
maintainer.description: You hang out in #gaim, you learn about stuff.

pkgmetadata.longdescription: Gaim-blogger is a protocol plugin for Gaim which makes use of Gaim's IM interface to post, edit, view and track blogs. This plugin implements the xml-rpc blogger api 1.0, published by Blogger. Gaim-blogger is not endorsed by or affiliated with Blogger or its parent company Google.
